context_bundle.summary: Power Automate Desktop Robin script syntax reference for PAD v11.2511+. Covers Variables, Flow Control, System actions with correct $fx'...' PowerFx expression syntax.

onboarding.quick_start: Syntax: $fx'...'=PowerFx expr, ``=placeholder, =>output var, %Var%=reference. Ctrl+Aâ†’Ctrl+C in flow designer to extract working syntax.

Paste Robin code directly into flow canvas (no import option)
